inventory.commentary: 15Aug06 - updated to 2.1, added examples and features. ahouston

sense.name: boundary line, demarcation between regions
sense.commentary: BORDER[+location][+region][+boundary] boundary line, borderline, delimitation, mete, margin, perimeter - the boundary line or the area immediately inside the boundary (usually specific to land)
sense.examples: The borders of the countries were redrawn after the war. Two men were picked up by the border patrol in Arizona. The accounting firm was skating the border between legal and illegal practices.

sense.name: decorative strip or margin of an object
sense.commentary: BORDER[+entity][+structure][+strip][+decorative][+carpet/+garden/+stationary] a decorative strip forming the outer edge of something
sense.examples: The rug had a wide blue border. These perennials make nice decorative borders in the garden. Mary's stationary has a floral design around the border.
